lines.setup: 'The ship is quiet,' Guinan thinks as she opens her bar for business. She isn't surprised. Not after last night's festivities. She knows the crew will need a friendly face and a kind listener. She picks up a forgotten phaser and a shiny workout onesie. It's going to be one of those days.
lines.anticipating_replicator_creation: looks at the serving plate thoughtfully.
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_nothing_on_replicator_plat: Replicator, I don't see my tea.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: I'm not sure what this is, but it isn't Bajoran Tea.
